BASIC CERTIFICATE COURSE
As the name implies, the BCC is about the fundamental or essential principles that will enable believers to become grounded in all facets of life.
COURSES OFFERED INCLUDE:
WORD DYNAMICS
• God’s Word is key for victorious Christian life.
• Learn to stand the storms and challenges of life.

REALITIES OF THE NEW BIRTH
• Know your true identity as a gOD on earth.
• Enjoy your rights and privileges as a child of God.

PRINCIPLES OF EVANGELISM
• Become a confident ambassador for Christ.
• Soul-winning made easy.
UNDERSTANDING VISION
• VISION-The greatest gift ever given to mankind.
• Vision is the source and hope of life.

WALKING IN DIVINE HEALTH
• You need Health to enjoy the good things of life.
• God’s will for man is Divine Health.

DYNAMICS OF HOLINESS
• Become equipped to overcome temptations and sinful habits.
• Living pure is possible.

HOW FAITH WORKS
• Believe, receive, and take dominion in all affairs of life.
• Operate in the supernatural.

PRINCIPLES OF KINGDOM SERVICE
• Understand what it really means to serve God.
• Find a place of Service that best expresses your gifts.

PRINCIPLES OF FINANCIAL PROSPERITY
• Wealth is a thing of the mind.
• Consistent practice of the covenant of wealth is the Key to Prosperity.

THE ART OF EFFECTIVE PRAYER
• When you pray amiss, you will not get the right results.
• Follow Biblical principles for quick answers to prayer.

MARRIAGE COVENANT
• Marriage is not a necessary evil but a thing of joy.
• Learn to eliminate conflict and crisis in Marriage.

THE HOLY SPIRIT
• The Holy Spirit is not a feeling or emotion, but a person.
• Get close to Him and enjoy unending help on earth.

MAXIMIZING GODLY POTENTIAL
• You were created with abilities to fulfill divine purpose.
• Stir them up and release them to the world for your profiting.

COURSE FEE FOR ALL COURSES: $110
NATURE OF PROGRAMME: (SELF-PACED) to be completed at the student’s own speed.
COURSE DURATION: 3 WEEKS
